hero.badge: In orbit and ready for liftoff
hero.description: Exploring the universe of code. 5+ years taking projects to new galaxies with React, TypeScript, and cutting-edge technologies.

about.title: Navigating the digital cosmos to
about.intro: I'm not just lines of code and commits.
about.description1: I'm a code explorer with solid experience in product environments. I've piloted ships at healthcare startups, administrative platforms, and internal tools where clean code and great UX are essential.
about.description2: My approach combines technical judgment with design sensitivity. I understand that a good product doesn't just work well — it also feels good for those who use it.

personal.title: When I close the IDE...
personal.anime: You'll find me binge-watching anime or rewatching Game of Thrones for the nth time (my favorite series, no debate).
personal.camping: I'm a nature enthusiast — whenever I can, I go camping with my friends, setting up tents and making campfires under the stars.
personal.photography: I'm also the official amateur photographer of the family, always capturing moments.
personal.noBeach: The beach? No thanks. I hate it. I'd rather have a mountain any day.

frontend.title: Frontend Development
frontend.description: Space-grade interfaces with React, TypeScript, and the latest technologies from the stellar fleet.

responsive.title: Responsive Design
responsive.description: Experiences that adapt to any vessel, from mobile satellites to space stations.

performance.title: Optimization
performance.description: Rocket speed. I optimize every pixel so your web launches without friction.

ux.title: UX/UI Integration
ux.description: I translate designs into interactive experiences that connect with the crew.

stack.title: Ship's Technology
stack.description: Cutting-edge weapons and tools to conquer any intergalactic challenge.

projects.title: Successful Explorations
projects.description: Space missions that have conquered new galaxies. Each one represents a unique journey with stellar results.

contact.title: Ready for a
contact.description: I'm scanning the universe for new space adventures. If you have an interesting mission, get in touch.
